agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: State Affairs TIME & DATE: upon final recess Thursday, April 25, 2019 PLACE: 3W.9 CHAIR: Rep. Dade Phelan SB 14 Nichols | et al. Relating to broadband service or facilities provided by an electric cooperative. SB 241 Nelson Relating to certain required reports received or prepared by state agencies and other governmental entities. SB 494 Huffman | et al. Relating to certain procedures applicable to meetings under the open meetings law and the disclosure of public information under the public information law in the event of an emergency, urgent public necessity, or catastrophic event. SB 557 Kolkhorst | et al. Relating to use of the electronic funds transfer system operated by the comptroller. SB 646 Birdwell | et al. Relating to approval for purchases of property or construction projects by a state agency with self-directed semi-independent status. SB 944 Watson | et al. Relating to the public information law. SB 988 Watson Relating to the assessment of litigation costs and attorney's fees in certain actions under the public information law. SB 1497 Zaffirini Relating to the registration and regulation of brokers by the Public Utility Commission of Texas. SB 1938 Hancock Relating to certificates of convenience and necessity for the construction of facilities for the transmission of electricity. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor.
